DOC.brief_title: Vessel Injury Relation With Strut Thickness Assessed OCT
DOC.detailed_description: Thinner strut produce less arterial injury stent implantation.The objective present study determine relation vascular injury induce stent strut thickness . Vessel injury stent implantation evaluate optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) . Two stent platform different strut thickness ( Coroflex ISAR 50 micron Biomatrix 120 micron ) compare .
DOC.criteria: Patients older 18 year Ischemic symptoms evidence myocardial ischemia ( inducible spontaneous ) presence > 50 % de novo stenosis locate native coronary vessel Target lesion locate leave main stem STEMI Restenosis Cardiogenic shock Malignancies comorbid condition life expectancy le 12 month may result protocol noncompliance Known allergy study medication ( probucol , sirolimus , zotarolimus ) Pregnancy ( present , suspect , plan )
